bibl.title: A New Muriarouros in a Bilingual Text.
bibl.note: P. Sorb. Inv. 746b (Suron Kome, 249/248 B.C.) is the Greek subscription to the demotic text P. Sorb. Inv. 1186 [ed.: Françoise DE CENIVAL, Un document inédit relatif à l'exploitation de terres du Fayoum (P. dém. Lille, Inv. Sorb. 1186), REg 20 (1968) pp. 37-50 et pl. 2] from the archive of the nomarches Aristarchos. The text gives a view of the tasks of a muriarouros, who clearly functions as an official, subordinate to the nomarches.
bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, A New Muriarouros in a Bilingual Text.

P. Sorb. Inv. 746b (Suron Kome, 249/248 B.C.) is the Greek subscription to the demotic text P. Sorb. Inv. 1186 [ed.: Françoise DE CENIVAL, Un document inédit relatif à l'exploitation de terres du Fayoum (P. dém. Lille, Inv. Sorb. 1186), REg 20 (1968) pp. 37-50 et pl. 2] from the archive of the nomarches Aristarchos. The text gives a view of the tasks of a muriarouros, who clearly functions as an official, subordinate to the nomarches.
